title: Personalized Education and Continuous Assessment Design Using Intelligent Tutoring Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Knowledge in Social Studies and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Requirement for semi-automated assessment tools due to learners' technological environment limitations (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can identify personalized learning materials tailored to their learning style and prior knowledge with 80% or higher accuracy via an Intelligent Tutoring System (ITS).
Learners can receive performance analysis at least twice a week using a real-time feedback system to adjust their learning strategies
Learners can achieve a score of 75 or above (out of 100) in the comprehensive evaluation at the end of the course
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
